name: Vulture
description: A large bird with a bald head and sharp beak, known for scavenging.
memorable: Its keen scent and sight make it a proficient scavenger.
goals: To scavenge dead creatures and carcasses for sustenance.
relations: Often found in groups scavenging together.
environment: Open areas and regions with decaying wildlife.
strengths: Possesses keen sight and smell to locate food sources from afar.
weaknesses: Very low strength, intelligence, and charisma, making it frail in combat.
attacks: Uses its sharp beak to deliver piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Defensive Bile can incapacitate attackers that hit it in melee combat.
senses: Has a highly perceptive ability, translating to effective perception of 18 when using sight or smell.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to detect threats or carrion from a distance.
additional_information: Carrion Sense allows it to find dead creatures within 60 feet.
Pack Tactics provides advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
Can use Retreat to evade melee attacks effectively.
Fragile with only 5 hit points and an AC of 10.
Not typically aggressive, prioritizes scavenging over combat.
test_queries: bird that finds dead creatures from afar
